title: UPGRADED KITCHEN AND BATHROOM! STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES!
posting_body: This great home features 693 sq ft of comfort!
Brand new, open entertainer's kitchen with new stone counters, crisp white cabinets, and a full suite of stainless steel energy-efficient appliances.
Enjoy the convenience of a full-size washer/dryer in your home and a walk-in closet in your bedroom.
There is a Subway Sandwiches right downstairs!
Revel in our prime location with a private walkway to the Colma BART station, easy access to Highways 101 and 280 and close proximity to shopping, restaurants and entertainment.
Enjoy a daily workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center, bring the kids to the outdoor play area, or shoot some hoops in our backyard courts.
Our building is gated and the parking is underground, making your experience here safe and secure.

All of our homes feature full size washer/dryers, heat and air conditioning, generous closet space, double-pane windows, two-tone paint and beautiful wood-like flooring in the kitchen, dining and bathrooms.
